    • setStoreRecordsInDaVinci

      public DaVinciRecordTransformerConfig.Builder setStoreRecordsInDaVinci(boolean storeRecordsInDaVinci)
      Parameters:
      storeRecordsInDaVinci - set this to false if you intend to store records in a custom storage, and not in the Da Vinci Client. Default is true.

    • setAlwaysBootstrapFromVersionTopic

      public DaVinciRecordTransformerConfig.Builder setAlwaysBootstrapFromVersionTopic(boolean alwaysBootstrapFromVersionTopic)
      Parameters:
      alwaysBootstrapFromVersionTopic - set this to true if storeRecordsInDaVinci is false, and you're storing records in memory without being backed by disk. Default is false.
